summary: This just a simple and fun mod for Marvel fans who also like Adam Warlock.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Adam Warlock Follower

[img]https://s26.postimg.org/hui7zpozt/adam-warlock.jpg[/img][/size][/color][/font]



[size=3][color=#ffff00]This mod adds the cosmic sorcerer, Adam Warlock to Dragonsreach in Whiterun. This is really just for fun and is not to be taken all that seriously. Adam is set to always be 10 levels above the player, uses a wide array of destruction/alteration/restoration and conjuration spells making him quite overpowered depending on what level you are.

He comes equipped with a daedric dagger and master destruction college robes. 

[/color][/size][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font] 
[*][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][size=3][color=#ffff00]
Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. 


[/color][/size][font=Arial][color=#ff0000][size=4]*Final Note: You [u]NEED[/u] to download and activate both KS Hair Renewal and The Witcher 3 Eyes if you plan to use this mod, otherwise my mod will not work as intended.[/size][/color][/font]
author: AedanStarfang
